skills.skill: Oracle WebLogic, IBM WebSphere, Redhat JBoss, Tomcat, Coherence
Cherwell and Service Now Ticketing Applications
Docker Images/Kubernetes for WebLogic and TomEE
AWS and Oracle OCI Cloud Computing
Insurance Life and Health Products Knowledge

duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor, analyze, and configure the OIPA Application and Database Servers to ensure optimal performance.
Tune database and application servers for optimal performance, including clustering, CPU, memory, and thread pool recommendations.
Design infrastructure environments and produce system design specification documents.
Review and design security requirements based on business user requirements and support complex deployments and migrations.
Assess short/long-term design implications to impact the effective and efficient operations of the OIPA and the PAS ecosystem.
Identify, recommend, and implement standardization and consolidation opportunities.
Manage multiple development designs and projects to meet project and customer required timelines and participate in project meetings.
Train and mentor other team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Actuarial Science, Math, Statistics, Finance, Computer Science, or equivalent experience.
